titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of State to designate the Taliban as a foreign terrorist organization.
A bill to require the Secretary of State to designate the Taliban as a foreign terrorist organization.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of State to designate the Taliban as a foreign terrorist organization. (Among other things, such a designation allows the Department of the Treasury to require financial institutions to block transactions involving the organization.)
